descriptionRequired: Enter a brief description of your list.
sponsored: Did you help with any value?
sponsoredTip: Its value will subtract from the total value. The others will pay the rest, divided between the number of names on the list.
confirmDelete: Do you really want to delete?
didYouPay: Have you already paid this amount?
copyListToShareTip: Copy this list to share in your WhatsApp or Telegram group.
addYourNameToTheList: Add your name to the list
slogan: Split the beer bill with your friends
aboutText:
Use Split Beer to organize that barbecue list, family gathering or happy hour.

By creating your list here, it's easier to share the list between your WhatsApp and Telegram groups.
copyListMsg: Copied list. Now just paste in the group.
internalError: Ops! Internal error. Try again in a few minutes.
confirmRemoveList: Remove this list from your history?
